meta.title: I Will Come
meta.guitar_comment:
Solo:
Bridge walk down after solo:

lines.text: As the water covers all the sea
So I am here, here with you
I surround you like the air you breathe
So I am here, here with you
I will come like a river
I will flow to heal your land
I will mend all that is broken
A smoldering wick I will not quench
A smoldering wick I will not quench
You are here O Lord we feel You here
You are here O Lord we feel You here
